website_summaries.verdict: Heats up spaces in close proximity better than any other patio heater, making it our choice for Best of the Best.
pros: Stands out for its impressive ability to effectively heat up the surrounding area within minutes
cons: Heat output drops significantly outside of a relatively small radius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool area
customer_reviews.text: Just setup two heaters for our pool area in Florida (no need for a lot of heat). Absolutely love the look at night. Good quality product - also bought extra covers. No problems with the instructions - it takes around 30 - 45 minutes to assemble them (based on your skills). A small step stool is helpful, but not needed (you can tilt the heater to assemble the top pieces).
customer_reviews.author: Manfred M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Unit
customer_reviews.text: I read all the negative reviews regarding the instructions and lower heat distribution. I found the instruction easy to understand and it took me about 30 minutes to put the unit together. Once the unit is ignited , the heat distribution is minimal, but after 10 minutes you can feel the heat 8 to 10 feet away. This unit looks better and heats much better then the traditional patio heater. I guess i lucked out because my unit is amazing, i plan on buying two more. Dwayne NY
customer_reviews.author: dwyane moore

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, elegant heater. As they say, not as much heat as the traditional ones but much more interesting. The flame going most of the way up the middle is a little like a camp fire, something to watch while you are getting warm. Love the stainless. It keeps looking nice while my original one is all rusty now. Holds up to a pretty good wind too. I've had several of the round bottomed ones blow over which really messes up the top, not to mention bending the long tube. This one doesn't seem to blow over and I live in a pretty windy place.
customer_reviews.author: DLC90266

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice take about 30 minutes to install all come in separate parts very good instruction very detailing screw size for each location in generally good product and produce very nice hit
customer_reviews.author: Eli I.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive—but marginally functional —“heater”
customer_reviews.text: Believe the reviews. This is a beautiful, stylish addition to your patio/pool/deck...but it’s not a heater. I’m currently sitting one foot away, and there’s barely enough heat to sustain me on a mildly brisk spring evening in California. Two feet further away, there’s not even a trace of heat. On a cold night, you would have to literally hug the metal grill to feel any warmth. I was hoping that the negative reviews were exaggerated. Nope. Like many other reviewers I’m going to keep the heater because it looks spectacular at night, but I’m disappointed. This is truly a case of style over substance.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings on this heater
customer_reviews.text: So it came and looks, when assembled, as it shows in the Amazon image. The problems that I had were with the way the company bored out some of the 'pre-drilled' holes. The bit used did not match the thread on the screw, well any screw in the package really. I had to run to a hardware store and buy a package of different screws and redrill them myself. It does give off heater better than I expected but to enjoy it you must stay within four or so feet of the heater. This was my experience and your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: JChampion

customer_reviews.title: We had to buy more
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal at $157. We bought two 3 years ago. With the latest price deal, we bought two more. They have done great. One of the old ones takes a bit longer to get warm enough to stay lit, but still works. They to not project much heat down and out. However, the look fantastic and are always a talking point during any parties. They put of just the right amount of light to add to the mood. The top three studs that hold the top cover will rust. Does not distract from the beauty of this heater/lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for ambiance, not for heat
customer_reviews.text: I"ve posted a video withan unboxing and review. But this is a patio you buy for ambiance, not for heat. It puts out a small amount, but if you're buying it for heat you probably won't be happy. If you're buying it to make your backyard sexy though, you'll be over the moon! See the video for complete details.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Cross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The flame is beautiful and sets the tone for a beautiful evening.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Mark Glen

customer_reviews.title: Fair but insane to put together
customer_reviews.text: More or less ok but assembly painful for a stupid reason. The stainless steel plates are covered in a protective film, but unlike most, this is nearly glued on. Took me an hour to remove it from the four panels. Material is lightweight and cheap. Heaven knows how it will stand up over time. I would consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Really nice heater. Of course not a lot of heat but probably good enough when sitting away like 3-4 feet. It took me 2:30 hours to assemble. Very easy to assemble if you follow the directions carefully. Looks great when lit. I also ordered the cover and it fits great. Will update when we start using the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, works great, just has a few poor construction points
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very easy. That was nice. But when it came to securing some of the screws down, some could not hold much torquing or the screw was not even biting. Luckily, those screws were not super important (retaining the screens down, but the screens have hooks to keep them secured so long as no one lifts them). The operation was super simple once I figured it out. Turn on the pilot light and it does look like a pilot light, and then turn on the main gas and adjust as needed. The flame puts out a wonderful yellow glow so you do not need lights.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: The box was badly damaged. Upon opening it I ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was badly damaged. Upon opening it I found that one of the legs was dented where the plastic foot insert is supposed to be. It was missing and I found one of the other four plastic inserts in the box. There is an assembly where the lighter and burner are attached to the body of the unit. 3 of the 4 nuts were missing. I had to disassemble the unit and use nuts I had in the garage. Very disappointing. Do not buy this product. The box was also a mess. I think it was flown over from china and pushed out of the plane on a fly over.
customer_reviews.author: herky

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty decoration, but does not warm the air
customer_reviews.text: Looks really neat with the flame coming up in the tube, but it does not put off heat. The only heat is if you put your hands right at the grate as close as possible. The rest of your body will not feel the heat at all. It is a pretty decoration, but does not warm the air. It comes in a big, flat box and you have to assemble it completely.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater is really pretty and easy to build, however it doesn’t actually warm you up unless you are practically standing against it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: so sad
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this along with the patio heater, thinking that they'd arrive together or least within the same week, month? But now I apparently have to wait from July (when ordered) until September for delivery. By that time my patio heater will be aged due to weather conditions? Strange that the delivery date can be so changed after ordering an item.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3's not bad...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 at first to try it out. Great quality, no damage, easy to assemble with good instructions. Ordered a 2nd one as soon as I lit the first. It went together very quickly but the pilot simply would not stay lit and the valve wouldn't let gas in to light it manually. Most likely a bad thermocouple. Requested a replacement from Amazon which came quickly. Tested the burner and it worked great so I swapped it out and returned the bad one. Did not need to disassemble the unit. Only 3 screws to remove the burner. Very easy. Now I have two awesome heaters!
customer_reviews.author: T. Metz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 and love them ... they do throw heat and if you live in New England you can use them for 4 people but do they throw big amounts no but no less then the ugly ones ... LOVE LOVE the light it throws my husband is very happy with the money we spend and feel the cost is pretty on point .... waiting on the covers still but they are worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: April P.

customer_reviews.title: Unit arrived with the square top welded on wrong so ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived with the square top welded on wrong so it did not line up with the base. They sent a replacement which was round so I could not use the cove I purchased for it. Glass tube cracked after 3 uses and the manufacturer will not replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciccio

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the south and this heater is perfect for our evenings. It is pretty to watch the flickering flame as well. My husband and I put it together in about one hour. It was easy to put together and we really like it! It seems to be good quality and a nice addition to our covered porch.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater but with some issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice heater but with some issues. Pros: nice looking, especially when lit. Cons: not durable. I had to send back the first because of bent parts and the replacement is good enough but has a couple bent pieces and one screw that won’t go in because of a defective pilot hole. The glass tube gets black and filthy when lit. I am not sure how to clean it nor prevent it. It doesn’t put out much heat. Most of the heat just goes around the top and floats upwards. The top is really too small. Many of the pieces arrived with scratches. I have only used it once but it seems nice but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically great, but has issues
customer_reviews.text: This heater really looks great, with it's shooting flame and aesthetics. However, the assembly instructions are poorly written (be sure to read the instructions AND look at the diagram), the fit is not perfect (don't completely tighten screws/nuts until all of them have been inserted when assembling the side panels and flame screen) and it does not put out as much heat as I expected. For the price, it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: SPAR

customer_reviews.title: It took me 2 hours to assemble but I like to go slow and take my time
customer_reviews.text: Item was very well packaged and arrived with all parts intact. Instructions provided were adequate for assembly with a few minor aberrations in the illustrations. It took me 2 hours to assemble but I like to go slow and take my time. Everything fit together as described. Once assembled it fired up per instructions and worked and looked great. Bought it for aesthetics, not for heating purposes and it does look good on the pool deck. It is in my opinion well made and sturdy but should anchor it for when high winds are forecasted, you definitely do not want it to topple over. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Almost no heat. Just for looks.
customer_reviews.text: It’s mostly for looks. You barely feel any heat at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Michael Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat this Value!
customer_reviews.text: I've shopped for this type of heater and know they don't put out that much heat. This are mostly for a ambiance and boy does this deliver. Assembly was not difficult and set up straight forward. Th top reflector was missing but the manufacturer promptly sent a replacement which shows how they stand by their product. We've received many compliments on this heater. Note: I did buy the recommended cover which does a nice job of protecting the heater from the elements when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Dhanda

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Light
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly as expected and emits a good amount of heat. Sitting on our patio in the evening it adds that nice amount of heat and light that I was looking for. Warning, it comes needing more assembly than some propane heaters. Each panel is assembled one at a time, multiple braces and posts to screw together, and you better be tall or have a step ladder to finish the assembly. It does co b email with a Philips screwdriver to help with assembly, but we used a powered Dewalt cordless for quicker assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great soft patio light source, marginal heater.
customer_reviews.text: I very happy with this heater, even though doesn't provide near enough heat. It makes up for this short coming with a great light show. The flame in the glass tube looks very cool. In fact, it is probably a better patio light than heater. If heat is your primary concern opt for something else or perhaps find a larger reflector for the top.
customer_reviews.author: Max B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice end product, very difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble, about 1/3 of the female treads were not cut, had to use a tap and die set to cut threads. Assembly directions are difficult to read, some of the illustrations were way too small. The second one I used a different sequence and it was considerably faster. Fit and finish of the individual pieces are very good, and the packaging was superb, you do end up with a lot of cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Kid

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and is a safe heating option, but has disappointing heat output
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a present for our parents. They have a different outdoor heater that puts out a lot of heat, but they wanted a safer option for the grandchildren. This one is definitely a safer option, as the cage around the heating element does not become hot to touch. The actual heat it puts out, though, is somewhat disappointing compared to the other stand up heater they have. It does put out heat, but you have to sit really close to the heater. However, the look of the heater is nice and decorative and adds a bit of class to their deck.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but not a heater.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and am disappointed. They are called "Patio Propane Heaters" but they really don't heat much. They assemble pretty easily and look great. So high points for both of those. But they really don't heat much unless you are standing up against it. I wish I considered heat output over aesthetics because these aren't accomplishing what I wanted them to.
customer_reviews.author: mmartin306

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!!! My 20 year old son put it together. I attached the propane tank and wow!! I got a lot of compliments at my party!!!! It creates quite an ambiance and gives off great heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Came damaged and installer did not bother to let me know, came back and spent with a pair of pliers. More aggravating is tha
customer_reviews.text: Top Came damaged and installer did not bother to let me know, came back and spent with a pair of pliers. More aggravating is that the compartment that holds the gas tank does not stay closed and falls. It looks good but that's it
customer_reviews.author: Pam H.

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son put the heater together. It was not simple but they were able to assemble it without too much difficultly in an afternoon. At one point when turning on the heater flames shot out and singed my husbands knuckles. It seems to be working well now and does give off a good bit of heat. We are hoping it will allow us to extend the use of our patio another month into the Fall. The flame in the glass tube is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning shopper

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Post Purchase Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts and AZ Patio Heater won't respond to a request to send the missing parts. Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Huffman

customer_reviews.title: They have paid attention to reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive after reading all 400+ reviews and made a large list of problems prior purchasers had discovered during assembly. In hindsight many of them were quite old reviews. My son & I put it together while watching a football game on TV and due to the quite detailed professional instruction booklet had no problems. Not one item on my list occurred and we enjoyed the process and game. Thanks to Amazon and AZ Patio, you've been listening.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to light without a lighter
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to light without a lighter. It took the Amazon assembler 2 1/2 hours to assemble it and finally get the pilot to light. The instructions in the manual on how to turn the heater on are actually incorrect. The assembler had to try several different methods before he was able to come up with a way to get the heater to turn on and now I have to use a lighter every time I want to use the heater. Whoever wrote the instruction manual should be fired. I would buy another brand so you don’t have to use matches or a lighter to ignite the heater each time you want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon enthuiast

customer_reviews.title: It takes a few minutes to really feel the heat. But then it’s great !
customer_reviews.text: The heaters came exactly on time. And in Great condition they were not hard to put together but you do need two people to do it. They give off good heat, and at night time they are so beautiful to look at. The way the flames go all the way to the top they are absolutely gorgeous. We chose the bronze color and we are so pleased with the color I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice addition to the yard.  Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought this. I knew it didn’t put out as much heat as others but it was more for looks so that was fine. If your standing next to it, it does put out some good heat though. I read that it was a nightmare to assemble but I thought it was very easy to assemble. Instructions are very clear and easy to follow. All together, we love it. Will probably get another for the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: David Stone

customer_reviews.title: All threaded holes had to be re-tapped.
customer_reviews.text: While the delivery of this heater was quick the assembly of said heater wasn’t. EVERY threaded hole was not properly drilled requiring me to re-tap all 42 holes so I could put this heater together. You would think that for the price they charge their Quality Control department would be more diligent on making sure SOP’s are followed. But I guess you have to place the blame in their manufacturing process for allowing this to pass through and getting packaged. It’s a nice heater, unfortunately crappy manufacturing practices will prevent me from buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't put outside without a full propane tank
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, but very lightweight...Recently mine tipped over with 10 mile an hour winds...Thinking of possible weight bags to put around the propane tank...
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Dutcher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but lower heat output
customer_reviews.text: We totally love this! It does not put out near the amount of heat our other non glass tube heater does, but the ambiance makes this a beautiful addition to our porch. It came packed securely though it is a big and heavy box. The sides do not get hot so would be very safe around kids and party goers! Very easy to roll on wood deck.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my patio. I think if the reflection tops were a little larger, it would reflect more heat down. However, they are very nice, cool looking and had a lot of great compliments. You need to buy the covers, I did and it is a must
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Waterman

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so pretty for ambiance and vibe
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so pretty for ambiance and vibe. Picture you on your patio enjoying the night with a cider in hand and this blazing fire in the distance. Still I love the crackle of a real flame, but this is so sweet! Its a bit of a pain to hold in the thermocoupler to turn it on, but otherwise awesome. Does not give off heat like the $1.5k Lavalight Towers, but im in FL so no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Very decorative!! Generates lots of light. Buy it for the ambience not the heat.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviews that it was difficult to assemble. It took us about an hour. The only mistake we made was regarding the 4 screws that anchor the base initially to the tower and the 4 screws that initially mount the burner to the tower. It's easy to assume they go in the outward side holes but those are for the side covers. Those initial 8 screws go inside the V of the tower rails. Pretty easy overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Visually Hot!
customer_reviews.text: Once you get yourself antiquated with how this goes together it's pretty straight forward. I live in Florida so I am not that concerned with the heat output. It is just a visually cool looking piece. I will update in time when finding out the longevity of the build.
customer_reviews.author: amazonsteve1234

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive outdoor heater
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor heater looks great on our patio. It's winter and too cold for it to actually warm the area, but we used it as late as Christmas, and will begin using it again in early spring because my husband loves grilling outside and this will help warm up the area. We love spending time outside on our terrace and this is a wonderful addition.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT a heater
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the beginning of the shut down so we could sit outside maybe with neighbors and enjoy some wine and conversation safely. It has awesome fire light feature but is definitely NOT a heater, even when you sit close to eat you better be bundled up. It'd very finicky to light and then eats propane so before you know it you have to buy another tank. Once to take hours to put together you are not likely to return it, so your husband just calls it the non-heater corona flame thrower.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M.

customer_reviews.title: Heating feature for patio
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our purchase. My husband totally assembled the unit by himself, the heat factor is not as intense as I thought it would be. Our patio has glass enclosure, but the wind rips around our home quite strong.
customer_reviews.author: Carole T.

customer_reviews.title: Really cool atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: They do not produce heat like the typical patio heaters. I think if it had a larger top it would reflect more heat back down where needed. They really light up the area and are very pleasing to look at - to the point of almost being mesmerizing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Hiland HLDS01 Patio Propane Heater with Wheels
customer_reviews.text: The Hiland Patio Heater works as described, and has good heat output. The only problem was the tolerance on one of the bolt holes that hold the protective screens in-place was not easy to access the screw in to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works decent for decorative piece, but rusts quick
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the panels where the screws go rusted out right away, as did the wing nuts on the top. The flame does work well and looks nice. I did not expect heat after reading other reviews, and they are correct- this is a good decorative piece but not to be bought for heat source.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my husband. He loves it, it looks great in our yard and I will likely order one or two more. Sets the mood and a beautiful ambiance
customer_reviews.author: twinkz

customer_reviews.title: Unique Addition
customer_reviews.text: We get rave reviews about this as a cool and unique decoration to the deck but the heat output is lacking. As long as there isn’t any breeze, you can feel the heat about 5 feet away. If there’s a slight breeze, the heat immediately dissipates. It does take the full 1.5 hours to assemble, but seems pretty sturdy and fired right up.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new patio heater! I went ahead and paid for the installation service because I knew it would be too much for me alone. And it was well worth it! The tech Amazon contracted out had it complete in less than 2hrs and showed me how to operate it. The heater gives out adequate heat; but I was already forewarned from readinf previous reviews about the lack of heat output..but it is definitely enough. It was a lot taller than I expected but still fit the space under my patio roof..and I can't wait to host my party!
customer_reviews.author: Aretha Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Well Engineered Product
customer_reviews.text: High Quality, even the manual was on high quality paper. Took 2.5 hours to assemble, next one would be less. Well marked and packaged hardware, however 3 of the screws were defective and had no grooves in head Overall a great product, though I'd pay t have it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: SBA

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 but 1 was broken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in November of 2019 and put one together. I LOVED it! I agree that it’s more of a flame show than a heater, but it’s beautiful! Today I put the second one together because we are having some guests over, and the glass cylinder was broken. Well after any warranty period, but I can’t seem to find a replacement glass. We love on the Texas coast and the first heater seemed to keep the mosquitoes away. If I could get a part number for a replacement glass cylinder, my review would be a 5! The one that was complete is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Product came in perfect condition and there were no missing parts as some people have complained about. I did hire my handyman to put it together as it was a tedious task. It looks good and works great. The heat output of 40,000 btu is probably not the best as the heat escapes quickly. I think if the top cover was a lot larger it would direct the heat downward more. It keeps you warm if you stay next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until the wind blew it over... Make sure it is tied down or have a tank in your unit!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this unit, unfortunately I had it out early this year on my patio and because it was early I did not have a propane tank in. We had a bad gust of wind this week and blew it over, shattering the tube and bending and cracking the top flame screen... I am trying to contact the mfg to see if I can get the replacement parts to get this unit up and running again...
customer_reviews.author: Deco Diver

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on 2/25 and today is 4/15, the glass tube inside just cracked up the entire heater. It was on for about 15-20 minutes. We have only used it a handful of times. Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua  R Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Patio and the experience was great. We received the heater in 2 days for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd patio heater I bought from Mr. Patio and the experience was great. We received the heater in 2 days for a party we were having. Set-up and operation are super easy. The heater produces plenty of heat, is attractive and looks nice with our outdoor furniture. We have a very large outdoor space so we bought this second heater to go with our first and it was the perfect amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ambiance, but not a lot of heat :(
customer_reviews.text: These heaters look amazing and create a wonderful ambiance, but compared to my regular propane patio heaters, they do not measure up. I was very disappointed that it doesn't provide a lot of heat output. I would suggest maybe a wider top so that the heat can bounce down like it does on the standard patio heaters. Still, very nice for ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Nice features ..nice heat ..provides warmth and light in the evenings !
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Product quality great! Heat output is also great ! Pazo electric works very well to light pilot. Pilot circuit is very fast. Cons: it is a bit more of a build than anticipated ..be sure to look closely for smallest fasteners especially the one that holds knob on acess door.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Klima

customer_reviews.title: Fancy! But doesn't give off much heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these, they look awesome! but if you're looking to heat up a large area I do recommend to get the regular mushroom heater. These look very fancy but don't give off much heat
customer_reviews.author: Product Tester

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive patio heater
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviews complained about complicated assembly and poor instructions. Perhaps I was prepared for the worst by having read those reviews but it took about one hour to assemble and I thought the pictures and instructions were quite good. Very nice looking heater and seems to throw a decent amount of heat. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Reg G. Siemens

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The glass tube turned completely black after a few hours of use. The manufacturer is utterly useless with their "help". Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: bananna

customer_reviews.title: This was probably the best packaged item I have ever purchased online
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the best packaged item I have ever purchased online. Hands down, and I spend a lot online. Every item was "Tetris" into the box perfectly, nothing was scratched and everything was individually wrapped. Went together easily and ver impressive. Excellent product. If I could give it 6 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been great in our pavilion. It won't keep you warm in 50 degrees, but it's nice in 65 to 70 degrees and its really pretty at night. Will update with any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Light up your night with a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, especially for the price! I was hesitant to buy, based on some of the reviews, but it arrived in great shape, is made of quality metal, went together easily, and is a beautiful addition to my patio area. These types of column heaters are more for visual display than actual heating, so you need to go into your purchase with that in mind. I am happy with the output, as it does a good job of heating the surrounding area, based on my expectations. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great! Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing! Was easy to build and turns on with no problem each time! I bought two of these and I couldn't be happier!! I will say these units don't put out much heat so get two.
customer_reviews.author: Eisha Castro

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PATIO HEATER!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Love this Heater for patio area next to hot tub and will be purchasing another for pool area. Not only puts off enough heat for drying off the dancing flame looks Amazing at night. Thinking about purchasing The tabletop model also.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on our patio
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our patio. It assembled pretty easily. My own tools worked better than the ones provided. The lighting instructions were unclear that was the only issue. Once I figured that out, it worked just fine. Looks great. Arrived on time. We would purchase again...
customer_reviews.author: Slohouse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not gonna heat you up.
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! Doesn’t get hot to the touch near the bottom which is great with a dog and grandchild near it. It does not put out a lot of heat when sitting by it which is what we were wanting so even though we may order another one we are still looking for a heater
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: What a great patio heaters
customer_reviews.text: I have two other patio heaters this one is absolutely the nicest to look at it throws heat out sideways and warms the whole area where we are sitting, it’s very nice to look at a great conversation piece I am well please
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Looks amazing. Puts off great heat and light. Simple to assemble roughly 15 mins using the tools provided. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steven Houghton

customer_reviews.title: beautiful warm flame
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a photo of this patio heater when it's on because it is so beautiful. I love sitting outdoors next to it. We don't have very chilly nights in So. Cal. so this is perfect for us. I said it was easy to assemble because I didn't do it, but my husband didn't complain so ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order more than one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these a few days apart .. the 1st was Was obviously a return because most screws where already in it (wrongly) the 2nd one looks nothing like the 1st and assembles completely different.. very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: it looks great at night
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these Glass Tube Heaters for our Patio, even knowing that they don't produce as much heat as a "Traditional" Patio Heater. But with that said, it looks great at night. Received many compliments from friends on it's looks. Handing out throw blankets also helped!
customer_reviews.author: William Herinya

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor ambiance
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this heater for the aesthetics, not for the heat. It looks beautiful in the evening and is very comfortable to sit next to. The quality of the item is quite good and assembly was quite easy. All pieces aligned perfectly and pictorial representations of the assembly process were easy to follow. Again, the more "standard looking" outdoor heaters throw a greater amount of heat for outdoor comfort, but this one wins hands down for beauty. I would highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WinstonMagoo

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered nov 1, 2017. February 4 , 2018 Temperature sensor is dead. Do not buy. Home use not commercial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heater and very easy to assemble. It doesn’t put out a ton of heat, but it does create an ambiance on the patio. I gave it 5 stars for ease of assembly and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kat and Marty

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look of this heater
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this heater. It is beautiful when the flames are going. It gives off heat but I wouldn’t get it excepting to heat a large deck or patio. We have a small deck that holds two chairs and a small couch with a table covered with a pergola in Los Angeles and it gives off enough heat in winter for us. It’s easy to light and my boyfriend put it together pretty quickly without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Altmann

customer_reviews.title: have not issued my refund yet, the heater hadf a bent shield and was miss various parts
customer_reviews.text: missing various parts , the shield was bent, I returned for a refund and have yet heard from them
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: heats up fast
customer_reviews.text: i ordered it on amazon 2 days to get it and 45 mins to set it u only tools you need is a ladder and a drill thing is a breeze i was all put together before i knew it. theres no extra parts screws etc so becarful not to lose any
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater
customer_reviews.text: Not used it much yet but tested well. Would recommend a cover. Little awkward to build but good and sturdy when completed
customer_reviews.author: Goodwdav

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glass tube heater.
customer_reviews.text: The heater was easy to assemble. I have used it 6 times and it lights easily. The flame in the glass tube is impressive and puts out a lot of light. Heat is only functional for about 3 feet from each side of the unit. I liked it so much that I ordered another unit to balance out my patio. With two units on my patio the look when lit is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Golliher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Having struggled with bizarre assembly directions in the past, this unit was a breath of delightful warm air. Very logical, easily decipherable directions, attractive, functional and easy to light. 5-star kudos!
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Leith

customer_reviews.title: Whoever posted that this is hard to assemble is not very handy..
customer_reviews.text: I told my wife the reviews were bad because of the instructions. I went out for an hour and she had it built. GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: John Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very high quaility
customer_reviews.text: Look and feels like the ones they use in expensive hotels. Heat radiation is on for cool weather. Looks wonderful when lighted up.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable and will blow over and break!
customer_reviews.text: Heater looks nice but doesn't put out a lot of heat. Very unstable, blew over and shattered the glass tube inside even with placing the heater in a safe area up against a large pillar and covered roof to protect from the wind. Would highly suggest anchoring down the tabs to avoid blowing over. Warranty department is no help to find replacement parts since they claim they claim this isn't a product defect.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Ford

customer_reviews.title: Disperses heat very poorly
customer_reviews.text: First the flame kept going out and would not stay lit up, Once we did manage to get it the heat could not be felt as much as it should. We had to set it up right next to us just to feel the heat, It is a very nice looking patio heater but just doesn't work as good as I thought. Other than that the setup was straightforward and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: AZ Patio Glass Cylinder Heater
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this really attractive patio heater. Set up was not difficult, and took me a little over an hour. Start-up was easy, just follow the lighting instructions. Also purchased the smaller unit, which comes mostly assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Harmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Like most reviews you won’t get a ton of heat out of this but it looks great. I assembled it alone in about 45 mins. The directions could be a tad better but if you think about what the directions say you can figure it out. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 2, great atmosphere doesn’t give off heat as my old ugly one, but much prefer this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Barnett

customer_reviews.title: great beautiful heater .
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful heater with great tech support as well cause I had rouble getting it started . The flame doesn't Go all the way to the top of the tube and it really don't produce a whole lot of heat "but" it's a beautiful sexy addition to my back yard Oasis. Love it .
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Minimal Heat Output
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but only for looks. We bought it for a heater and it hardly puts off heat. Would not by this again.
customer_reviews.author: AMY GUNNELS

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and terrible for heat
customer_reviews.text: Not much heat so great for California where I am! It won’t work in cold winters. Overall (in California!) it performs great and looks good too and good value. It’s more fir effect than heat.
customer_reviews.author: Ok

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for patio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and was great addition for pool patio. It took less than 2 hours for one person to assemble. It does not heat up a big space unless you stand next to it but does add ambiance and lights up the entire backyard like a campfire. I think the triangular shape is more stable than rectangular as it stands like a tripod. With a gas tank installed the base becomes more firm with two coasters for moving around. It is also easy to light with an electric battery ignition switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much that we're going to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Started to buy a heater like this at a local store, but then decided to save $120 and hope for the best. It was a great decision. Assembly we fairly easy with two people, it only took about 20-30 minutes. Quality is nice, as well. I don't think you'd be disappointed with this unit. We will be purchasing a second one, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Coddington

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice takes about 40 minutes to out together but not difficult at all!
customer_reviews.author: karina P

customer_reviews.title: doesn't throw out as much heat as the boring patio heaters
customer_reviews.text: doesn't throw out as much heat as the boring patio heaters ....but I love this thing...puts out great light nice warmth...good quality....TALL! its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DSE

product_meta.title: Hiland HLDSO1-GTSS 91-Inch Tall Quartz Glass Tube Heater - Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverThe latest in design and heat, the Quartz Glass Tube Flame Heater brings style to outdoor heating. Its unique, visually mesmerizing flame provides heat in every direction. Watch your friends gather around this beautiful piece of patio art. A safety valve shuts it off automatically if tilted. Attached wheels make moving a snap. One-year manufacturer's . Add cozy warmth anywhere.
feature_bullets: 40,000 BTU Propane (LP) Pyramid Heater with Quartz Glass tube
Mobility wheels for easy movement around the patio or deck

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,105 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
